titles.title: Thank You for the Cross/Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thank You for the cross Lord Thank You for the price You paid Bearing all my sin and shame In love You came and gave amazing grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thank You for this love Lord Thank You for the nail pierced hands Washed me in the cleansing flow Now all I know Your forgiveness and embrace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy is the Lamb Seated on the throne Crown You now with many crowns You reign victorious{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}High and lifted up Jesus Son of God The Treasure of Heaven crucified Worthy is the Lamb Worthy is the Lamb{/lang-eng}
